synopsis.text:
Mangaka Shoutarou Tokunou unveils an exclusive, unaired 13th episode of the beloved anime series, New Game!, featuring an open-air bath adventure. This special episode is a unique reward for dedicated fans who gather tickets included with all six Blu-ray Disc or DVD volumes.

In this bonus content, the hardworking team at Eagle Jump embarks on a much-needed getaway to a picturesque ski resort, marking the release of their latest 'Fairies Story' game. For Aoba Suzukaze, this company trip signifies her first skiing experience, stirring up a whirlwind of anticipation and nervousness. Follow Aoba and her colleagues as they unwind, make memories, and revel in the thrill of the resort.  This unaired episode promises laughter, camaraderie, and a fresh perspective on your favorite characters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
